attributes.action: exclude burglars, other intruders and trespassers from the duty of care owed by property owners and occupiers to those on their premises.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Third party liability on owners and occupiers of premises and land should extend only to those persons authorised by permission or statute to be there, and only at such times and on such terms as that authorisation has been granted.
